snippet: The Denver Broncos are off to a perfect start under quarterback Trevor Siemian. The New England Patriots also are 3-0 despite playing without superstar Tom Brady....
lead_paragraph: The Denver Broncos are off to a perfect start under quarterback Trevor Siemian. The New England Patriots also are 3-0 despite playing without superstar Tom Brady.

headline.main: AP Power Rankings: This Time It's Pats, Denver Tied at No. 1
headline.print_headline: AP Power Rankings: This Time It's Pats, Denver Tied at No. 1
